dialogueList.name: Matek
sentences: The foolish romantic that has come to die......although you are half dead already.
Cant say the same about your little bride.
She must be nothing but a piece of meat by now.

dialogueList.name: Matek
sentences: Just like how Update() called in every frame, you are called in my mind every frame too.
I love user interfaces because that is where U and I are always together.
You are my while loop condition. I keep coming back to you.
